meanings.sent1: She is always so gabby during lunchtime, sharing stories with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The gabby parrot wouldn't stop talking, even when no one was listening.
meanings.sent3: The gabby squirrel in the park entertained the children with its constant chatter.
meanings.sent4: Her gabby nature was like a bubbling brook, never running out of words.
meanings.sent5: The gabby old man at the bus stop made an impression on everyone with his lively tales.

meanings.sent1: The gabby student couldn't resist sharing every detail of his weekend.
meanings.sent2: Despite being gabby, she was a good listener when others needed to talk.
meanings.sent3: The gabby cat meowed non-stop until it got a treat, revealing its true nature.
meanings.sent4: His gabby tendencies flowed like a river, unstoppable and overflowing.
meanings.sent5: The gabby toddler filled the room with laughter and chatter, brightening everyone's day.

meanings.sent1: The gabby neighbor would talk for hours about the weather, never noticing the time.
meanings.sent2: She was so gabby that even a short question would lead to a long conversation.
meanings.sent3: The gabby radio host kept rambling on, making the listeners chuckle at his stories.
meanings.sent4: Her gabby outbursts were like fireworks, bursting with words and energy.
meanings.sent5: The gabby salesman could convince anyone with his never-ending stream of words.
